item.title: Bioluminescence Experience in Holbox
item.description: Bioluminescence is an extraordinary natural phenomenon in which tiny creatures make water glow by capturing light. Enjoy this experience in a group of no more than 10 people, with a certified guide, by booking this nighttime snorkeling tour with transfers from your accommodation on Holbox Island. The package includes snorkel gear, a long wetsuit, water shoes and mosquito protection, as well as a money-back guarantee if we fail to see the bioluminescence.

image.alt: Bioluminescence Experience in Holbox

item.location: Isla Holbox, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Whale Shark and Snorkeling Adventure from Isla Holbox
item.description: Snorkel alongside docile whale sharks during this eco-adventure on Isla Holbox. With your local guides, board a boat and set off in search of these gentle giants, keeping a lookout for other species like giant manta rays and sea turtles as you cruise. Slip into the water in pairs with a knowledgeable guide and swim with the world's largest fish, which can grow up to 45 feet (14 meters) long. On the way back to shore,Â stop near Cabo Catoche to snorkel the 'cuevones' reef. Continue to Santa Paula to go swimming and enjoy freshly caught ceviche before returning to Holbox. Use of all equipment, breakfast and snacks are included.

image.alt: Whale Shark and Snorkeling Adventure from Isla Holbox

item.location: Isla Holbox, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Kayak Mangroves Sunrise Experience
item.description: An active way to explore the Holbox area, this tour takes you on a kayaking journey through a mangrove where various animal species coexist. The best time to visit is at sunrise when many animals are active after a night's rest, such as crocodiles. Enjoy exclusive moments in nature as you paddle among exotic birds, basking in the beauty of the sunrise and twinkling stars. Glide through the tranquil mangrove labyrinth, absorbing the vibrant colors of nature as you go.

image.alt: Kayak Mangroves Sunrise Experience

item.location: Isla Holbox, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Bioluminescence Tour in Kayak in Holbox Island
item.description: Kayak under the starry night in the waters of Holbox, observe the milky way and its constellations, walk on the sandbanks and swim with the BIOLUMINESCIA (plankton) in one of the most beautiful beaches of Holbox (Punta Mosquito)

image.alt: Bioluminescence Tour in Kayak in Holbox Island

item.location: Isla Holbox, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Magic Night of Stargazing and Bioluminescence
item.description: Explanation about the celestial vault, including the different constellations of the zodiac that may appear at the time on this dark and quiet night, the observation of this phenomenon of light, which is more visible when we escape all light pollution generated by hotels. This is a subtle activity, we will paddle gently to find the darkest corners of the island to observe and swim with Bioluminescence on unique occasions in these autumn months, join our trained, experienced bilingual guide, join us in an unforgettable night here in Holbox Island!!.

image.alt: Magic Night of Stargazing and Bioluminescence

item.location: Isla Holbox, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Private Boat to visit Holbox surroundings (3-Island Tour)
item.description: Take a boat tour to Passion Island, Isla Pajaros, and Yalahau Spring from Isla Holbox. On this guided excursion, view over 35 species of nesting birds on Isla Pajaros (Bird Island), including frigates and pelicans. Hear about the birds' migration patterns and breeding behaviors from your bird-loving local guide. Continue to Passion Island to see the resident flamingos, then swim in the cenote (freshwater sinkhole) at Yalahau.

image.alt: Private Boat to visit Holbox surroundings (3-Island Tour)

item.location: Isla Holbox, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Kitesurfing lessons in Isla Holbox
item.description:
KukulKite is a school dedicated to the practice of Kitesurfing / Kiteboarding on Holbox Island. We offer Kite classes for all types of levels in an ideal environment, thus ensuring a fast and safe learning with the kite.
We know you want to be sliding in the water and flying as fast as possible, Quiet! We will take you to that point in the easiest and safest way. With the right equipment and the conditions of Holbox you will know how to handle the kite perfectly and have all the knowledge about Kitesurf / Kiteboard in 3 or 4 days.
Kite Kitesurf ,, or Kiteboerding is a sport practiced by people of all ages and does not require much physical strength, it is like riding a bicycle, it takes a little practice to learn, but it is something that is then done naturally.
We recommend our full IKO certified course for people who want to learn the sport correctly and navigate fluently.

image.alt: Kitesurfing lessons in Isla Holbox

item.location: Isla Holbox, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Bioluminescence and astronomy Night Kayak Tour
item.description: Marvel at the glistening water flowing from your paddle and around your boat on this overnight kayaking adventure. It's bioluminescence, a natural phenomenon caused by tiny creatures in the water. With a group of no more than 14 people and a guide to lead the way, you'll paddle under the stars in dark waters where you can swim and interact with bioluminescence.

image.alt: Bioluminescence and astronomy Night Kayak Tour

item.location: Isla Holbox, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Boat Tour of Three Islands in Holbox with Transportation
item.description: If you visit Holbox you cannot miss this tour. Discover the surroundings of Holbox Island in a magical and relaxed boat tour. Visit Isla PÃ¡jaros, Isla PasiÃ³n and immerse yourself in the crystal clear waters of the cenote. Without a doubt, an experience that you cannot miss.

image.alt: Boat Tour of Three Islands in Holbox with Transportation

item.location: Isla Holbox, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Kayaking Tour Through the Mangroves in Isla Holbox
item.description: Kayak through the mangrove swamps of Isla Holbox during this morning tour. Under the watchful eye of your professional kayaking guide, slip into your double kayak and paddle off through the shallow, calm water. Paddle through the forest, alive with the sounds of coastal wading birds. Listen to commentary from your guide as you keep an eye out for flamingos and alligators sunning themselves on the banks of the channels. Round-trip transportation from Isla Holbox and bottled water are included.

image.alt: Kayaking Tour Through the Mangroves in Isla Holbox

item.location: Isla Holbox, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Whale Shark Group Adventure from Isla Holbox
item.description: During your vacation on Isla Holbox, don't missÂ swimming with whale sharks. This gentle creature measures up to 45 feet long (14 meters) and is considered the largest fish in the world. During your boat trip, search for manta rays, dolphins, and sea turtles. Then pop into the warm waters of the Gulf of Mexico to swim side-by-side with whale sharks in their natural habitat. Snorkel gear and wetsuit are included along with a light breakfast, lunch, and fish ceviche.

image.alt: Whale Shark Group Adventure from Isla Holbox

item.location: Isla Holbox, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Kayak adventure through the mangroves
item.description: Kayak tour through the mangroves where you can observe wildlife and different types of endemic and migratory birds in which they stand out; American flamingo, osprey, chocolatiers, herons and plovers. The activity is guided by an expert guide in birds and wildlife.

image.alt: Kayak adventure through the mangroves

item.location: Isla Holbox, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Whale Shark Tour from Holbox Island
item.description: Swim tantalizingly close to whale sharks, the largest fish in the world, on this 6-hour boat tour from Holbox island. After a safety briefing, cruise out to waters where whale sharks glide along and feed, and then hop in. A certified guide is with you as you admire the gracefulness of the gentle giants underwater. Follow this with excellent snorkeling at Cabo Catoche. Expect personalized attention on this small-group tour limited to just eight adventure seekers. Lunch and hotel transport included.

image.alt: Whale Shark Tour from Holbox Island

item.location: Isla Holbox, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Full Day Tour with Fishing and Snorkeling from Holbox
item.description: Cabo Catoche is located precisely where the Gulf of Mexico ends and the Caribbean Sea begins. Cabo Catoche can only be reached by boat from Holbox. It is a semi-uninhabited island where only a family of fishermen lives, who will be our hosts on this excursion. Where nature is its best guest, the birds feel free, the trees and bushes provide refreshing shade, while the soft sand invites you to walk on the shore, The perfect place for fishing, snorkeling and a fresh ceviche with the catch of the day, without a doubt an adventure that you cannot miss. Let yourself be amazed at its white beaches and enjoy a fresh fish ceviche and a cold beer.

image.alt: Full Day Tour with Fishing and Snorkeling from Holbox

item.location: Isla Holbox, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Kayak Experience in the Mangroves of Holbox Island
item.description: Enjoy the lush landscapes of Holbox Island on a kayak tour of the nature reserve. Join a guide and a small group for a relaxing journey through the mangroves and closer contact with nature. Learn about the ecology of the area from your guide and see various indigenous species including crocodiles, flamingos, rays and pelicans as you paddle.

image.alt: Kayak Experience in the Mangroves of Holbox Island

item.location: Isla Holbox, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Classic 3-island tour on a shared boat-Entrance Yalahau included-
item.description: Cruise the wild and scenic coastlines surrounding Isla Holbox on a 3-stop tour featuring Punta Mosquito (or Isla Pajaros), Passion Island, and Yalahau Lagoon. Shared boat transport makes this a budget-friendly alternative to hiring a private vessel and captain, and youâll see three very different sides of the coast, from pristine beaches to mangroves home to thriving marine wildlife.

image.alt: Classic 3-island tour on a shared boat-Entrance Yalahau included-

item.location: Isla Holbox, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Bioluminescence Tour by Car at Holbox
item.description:
The Bioluminescence follow a moon calendar, please contact us at WhatsApp to confirm the exact time of the tour
The Bioluminescence is a natural phenomenon cause by the large plankton concentration at the Golf of Mexico, each night it illuminates ours coasts cause by a chemical reaction. The tour is done by Golfcar until the Punta Cocosâ bay is reached or its surroundings, a dark spot perfect to observe the phenomenon and also the unforgettable stellar mantle, constellations, nebulae and the Milky Way.
A Magical night without a doubt

image.alt: Bioluminescence Tour by Car at Holbox

item.location: Isla Holbox, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Tequila Tasting Experience
item.description: Tequila Tasting is an experience of Tequila O'clock, a place owned by a person originally from the town of Tequila Jalisco, this will ensure you an authentic way of discovering this ancient spirit of Mexico. In Holbox, this is the unique place where you can enjoy of more than 50 different tequilas. Tequila Tasting experience is the best way to know how tequila is produced, where, what categories and types exist, what are the best ways of enjoying it and how to recognize an authentic one. During this tasting we will talk about the organoleptic characteristics of this drink and you'll be able to experience them by yourself.

image.alt: Tequila Tasting Experience

item.location: Isla Holbox, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: From Holbox to Cancun Private Transportation
item.description: Make your departure from Holbox Island an easy one by pre-booking a private transfer service. Eliminate the hassle of figuring out taxis and ferry tickets with this all-in-one package. Your driver meets you at your accommodation on the island and takes you to the ferry terminal. Once your ferry journey is complete, another driver meets you for your transfer to Cancun International Airport (CUN) or to the hotel zone.

image.alt: From Holbox to Cancun Private Transportation

item.location: Isla Holbox, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Mangroves Paddling tour
item.description: Explore serene mangroves on a guided kayaking adventure with options for beginners or experienced paddlers. Witness diverse wildlife, including flamingos (seasonal), and take a break to hydrate mid-route. Opt to paddle further to Playa Woow, an unspoiled beach. Includes hotel transfers, water, and snacks.

image.alt: Mangroves Paddling tour

item.location: Isla Holbox, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Relaxing private boat tour to Cabo Catoche with fishing and snorkeling
item.description: Gain an alternative perspective of Quintana Rooâs coastline on a private boat tour to Cabo Catoche from Holbox. Take the opportunity to fish on board for insight into the regionâs main industry, and enjoy plenty of time to snorkel and swim in the calm waters. Opt to sail with or without a guide to suit your needs, and keep energized with a seafood lunch included in the price.

image.alt: Relaxing private boat tour to Cabo Catoche with fishing and snorkeling

item.location: Isla Holbox, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Private boat tour (3 islands tour)
item.description: Tour the waters of Holbox and the beauties that surround it. visit Isla PasiÃ³n, Punta Mosquito and the Yalahau spring from Isla Holbox on this guided excursion. Isla PasiÃ³n to see the resident flamingos, then enjoy a swim in the cenote (a freshwater sinkhole) in Yalahau. Finally, get to know the sandbanks and the crystal clear beaches in Punta Mosquito Includes round-trip transfers from Holbox Island hotels.

image.alt: Private boat tour (3 islands tour)

item.location: Isla Holbox, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Private Fishing Tour from Isla Holbox (up to 6 pax)
item.description: Fish in the waters off Isla Holbox during this half-day private tour for up to six. With a local captain on board, you'll get an inside track on the best fishing spots with as much or as little guidance as you likeâplus the personalized service youâd expect on a private charter. Cast a line for fish like grouper, mojarra, snapper, and sea bass, then learn to prepare ceviche.

image.alt: Private Fishing Tour from Isla Holbox (up to 6 pax)

item.location: Isla Holbox, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan

item.title: Horseback Riding on the Beaches of Holbox
item.description: We will make your dream come true, horseback riding on the beach, enjoying the spectacular views of the Mexican Caribbean in a natural landscape full of magic... in an atmosphere of privacy and exclusive service. Horseback riding on the beach and in the mangroves. Enjoy the flora and fauna that make Holbox unique, listen to the song of the birds and the lullaby of the wind, admiring nature.

image.alt: Horseback Riding on the Beaches of Holbox

item.location: Isla Holbox, Riviera Maya & the Yucatan
